dcterms:description: ImageNet-LT is constructed from ImageNet-2012 by sampling a subset following the Pareto distribution with the power value Î± = 6, which contains 1000 classes. The training set has 115.8K images and the number of images per class ranges from 1280 to 5 images.
dcterms:title: ImageNet-LT

dcterms:creator: Kaidi Cao
Colin Wei
Adrien Gaidon
Nikos Arechiga
Tengyu Ma
dcterms:description: CIFAR100-LT is a set of long-tailed datasets with different imbalance factors sampled from CIFAR-100 with 100 categories. The imbalance factor is defined as the ratio between the number of images for the most frequent class and the least frequent class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR100-LT

dcterms:creator: Grant Van Horn

Yin Cui
Chen Sun
Alex Shepard
Hartwig Adam
Pietro Perona
Serge Belongie
dcterms:description: iNaturalist 2018 is a real-world, naturally long-tailed dataset composed of 8,142 fine-grained species. The training set contains 437.5K images and its imbalance factor is equal to 500.
dcterms:title: iNaturalist 2018
